title: TITLE Boxing Ionic Strike Punch Mitts, Grey/Orange
features: Ionic Strike Technology incorporates thousands of malleable, plastic, polymer beads precisely inset and reinforced inside of surrounding resistance foams exterior walls to offer the most vivid, actual life-like feel with every punch and strike
Exclusive collection of more than 3” of technically advanced beads “give” when they are struck, but immediately rebound right back into original round shape
Complete with a full wraparound wrist strap, metal D-ring and hook-and-loop closure for a secure, no slip fit
Nylon mesh back hand inset helps release hot air and keep trainers cooler and drier during intense training
description: The TITLE Ionic Strike Technology is the new revolution in punch shield mitt training and experience. Ionic Strike Technology incorporates thousands of malleable, plastic polymer beads precisely inset and reinforced inside of surrounding resistance foam exterior walls to offer the most vivid, actual life-like feel with every punch and strike. This exclusive collection of more than 5” of technically advanced beads “give” when they are struck and immediately rebound right back into original round shape so they are active, responsive and reactive with every impact. The Ionic Strike beads’ ability to absorb impact, slightly adjust position inside of their protected enclosure, and adapt to an incoming fist or glove, helps create the most amazing, realistic, technologically-advanced target for catching punches and strikes. Complete with a full wraparound wrist strap, metal D-ring and hook-and-loop closure for a secure, no slip fit for every trainer. A nylon mesh back hand inset helps release hot air and keep trainers cooler and drier during intense training. Ideal for alleviating stress on trainer’s wrists, palms, elbows and shoulders. If you are looking for the newest and most advanced innovation in punch mitt training, the Ionic Strike Punch Mitts are your “must have” choice.
